verses.name: Acts 4:24
verses.text: And when they heard that, they lifted up their voice to God with one accord, and said, Lord, thou art God, which hast made heaven, and earth, and the sea, and all that in them is:

verses.name: Acts 4:25
verses.text: Who by the mouth of thy servant David hast said, Why did the heathen rage, and the people imagine vain things?

verses.name: Acts 4:26
verses.text: The kings of the earth stood up, and the rulers were gathered together against the Lord, and against his Christ.
